reviews.review_msg: Shafik is one of the most committed professors I have had, he makes sure he is available for his students whenever they need it. He spoke to me on the phone for 40 minutes on a Sunday while he was at his law firm to help me feel more prepared by answering questions I had about our midterm. He truly cares, and is a prof cap is lucky to have.

Shafiks a nice guy and cares about his class however his refusal to use Capilano U's Moodle class portal makes for serious confusion about due dates and where to find assignments. Digging through countless emails about his kids' Saturday activities to find assignments is driving our class bananas. Takes far too long going through notes in lecture.
